General.Name: Hypothekarbank Lenzburg AG
General.Description: Hypothekarbank Lenzburg AG provides various banking services and products to private customers and companies in Switzerland. The company offers savings accounts; real estate financing and mortgages; credit, debit, and travel cards; investment products; pension products; financial planning solutions; and tax services. It operates through a network of 13 branches and 2 advisory offices in 12 municipalities in Aargau, Switzerland. The company was founded in 1868 and is headquartered in Lenzburg, Switzerland.
